This GC contains a Trojan Horse that slows down your computer by calculating to earn 'money' for someone else (mining). Show package contents>MacOS>arch.zip. You better download the demo from Lemkesoft and use the KeyGen.
If you are infected delete: Users/yourlogon/Library/LaunchAgents/com.apple.legion.plist and the folder Users/yourlogon/Library/mdsa1331/
